Muncie.Ball State University College of Communi: The College of Communication, Information, and Media (CCIM) is part of Ball State University in Muncie, Indiana. Located in two buildings—Ball Communication Building and the David Letterman Communication and Media Building—CCIM serves as the location for classes, offices, television studios, and a radio station. There are 1,300 majors and minors within the college, placing it among the ten largest communications programs in the United States.
